channel.title: Echinochloa colona on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Echinochloa colona on funPlantGenes

item.title: EcABCC8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: EC_v4.g098055 Gene Symbol: EcABCC8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Echinochloa colona Functional Description: EcABCC8 is likely a plasma membrane-localized transporter extruding cytoplasmic glyphosate to the apoplast, lowering the cellular glyphosate level.
